Articles.Content: Hey, I can't seem to find what we call the two objects for the wing? ctrl_surface and obj_surface right?

Hi doesnt matter anymore, call them whatever you want,  .  As long as the transforms are referenced correctly in the cfg.   previous incarnations of ksp that used winglet instead of part module  used obj_base and obj_Ctrlsrf (maybe) .  As i say though that all changed just before v1 think.

7 hours ago, Deltafee said:

Hey, I can't seem to find what we call the two objects for the wing? ctrl_surface and obj_surface right?
